Name: Color Patterns
About the game: Color Patterns is a minimalist puzzle game inspired by the classic board game domino. - Designed for puzzle lovers ; - Solve 40 carefully crafted challenging levels; - Minimalist design. No score, timer or pressure; - Mouse-only controls. Left click to move pieces between spaces. Right click on the pieces to rotate; Follow the symbols of each color to solve the puzzle. Red: Green: Blue: Yellow: A challenging puzzle game that requires attention. With carefully crafted levels, the challenge is to find the correct patterns on the board. Some pieces can work in more than one position. Can you find the correct pattern that will solve each puzzle? Try it out and show that you are a puzzle expert.
